meanings.definition: A kitchen servant responsible for menial tasks.
meanings.sent1: The scullions washed the dishes in the busy kitchen.
meanings.sent2: The scullions worked hard to keep the kitchen clean.
meanings.sent3: The scullions accidentally used salt instead of sugar in the dessert.
meanings.sent4: The scullions were the unsung heroes of the culinary battlefield.
meanings.sent5: The scullions scrubbed pots and pans tirelessly every day.

meanings.sent1: Many scullions were needed to manage the large feast.
meanings.sent2: The scullions were all lined up, ready to start their duties.
meanings.sent3: The scullions formed a secret club to share kitchen jokes.
meanings.sent4: The scullions, like ants in a colony, worked together seamlessly.
meanings.sent5: The scullions' laughter echoed through the bustling kitchen.
